features: Dishwasher-Safe Paring Knife: This utility knife controls slicing, peeling and cutting fruits, vegetables and meats
Stainless Steel Knife: The Utility Paring Knife is made from high-carbon stainless steel to retain sharpness and allow re-sharpening
Ergonomic Handle: This knife has a soft-touch rubber grip to reduce hand fatigue and allow for precision
Knife Sheath: The safety blade guard protects this knife for travel and storage when camping or tailgating
Zyliss Kitchen Accessories: Zyliss kitchen tools are favored by everyday cooks & gourmet chefs alike

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Spreading Joy and Ease: A Review of the Large Sandwich Knife for Quick and Effortless Spreading
reviews.reviewText: In the realm of kitchen tools, the Large Sandwich Knife has emerged as a delightful solution that brings efficiency and ease to the art of sandwich-making. With its thoughtful design and superior size, this knife has quickly become my go-to choice for spreading condiments with speed and precision. Here's my comprehensive review of the Large Sandwich Knife, highlighting its impressive performance in the culinary realm.From the moment I held the Large Sandwich Knife in my hand, its substantial size and ergonomic design were immediately evident. The knife's larger blade provides ample coverage, allowing me to spread condiments evenly across the bread with a single stroke. This intuitive design not only saves time but also ensures a uniform layer of ingredients for a perfectly balanced sandwich.The standout feature of this sandwich knife is its serrated edge. While designed primarily for spreading, the serrated edge also offers the versatility to slice through various ingredients, from thick spreads to layers of deli meats and veggies. This dual-purpose functionality minimizes the need to switch between tools, further streamlining the sandwich-making process.The knife's performance in spreading condiments is particularly impressive. The large blade effortlessly glides over the surface of the bread, spreading mayo, mustard, or other spreads with smooth and consistent coverage. This ease of spreading is not only a time-saver but also adds an element of finesse to the final presentation.The ergonomic handle of the Large Sandwich Knife adds to its user-friendly design. It offers a comfortable grip that ensures control and precision while spreading. The weight distribution is well-balanced, reducing the strain on the wrist during extended use.Additionally, the knife's durability is a notable aspect. The materials used in its construction are robust and resistant to wear, ensuring that the knife maintains its performance over time. Its easy-to-clean design adds to the overall convenience, making it a hassle-free tool for everyday use.In conclusion, the Large Sandwich Knife is a culinary companion that adds efficiency and flair to the sandwich-making process. Its generous size, serrated edge, and ergonomic design combine to create a tool that excels in both spreading and slicing. Whether you're crafting a classic sandwich or experimenting with creative combinations, this knife ensures quick and precise spreading, elevating your culinary creations. With its user-friendly features and durable construction, the Large Sandwich Knife is an essential tool for any kitchen, making the task of sandwich-making a joyous and effortless endeavor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best in Class!!!
reviews.reviewText: Best little knife I've ever used! Beats all my other smaller knives (expensive or cheap!) I've ever had!!! First got this knife through a brick and mortar store on clearance. Couldn't find it anywhere locally after using it. Even my neighbor said it was the best little knife she'd ever used. Ordered it through Amazon paying double what I'd paid before. WELL worth it! The serrated edge makes it useful for slicing tomatoes, hard boiled eggs, ham, or any lunch meats in blocks. It keeps the stuff I'm slicing intact and not shredded or crumbled. LOVE this knife. Word of warning: VERY SHARP! Cut with care!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality knife
reviews.reviewText: Great quality knife. Sheath is great idea too, because this knife is really sharp. We bought a few of them and expect an easy 10 years each.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars But will they last
reviews.reviewText: 4/5 because they are new. Great for peanut butter retrieval ...mild flex - just wondering if the blade will break at handle junction. Time will tell. Otherwise ...very attractive and fun knives . I bought 3

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very sharp (like the included guard) and easy to clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works great and it’s easy to hold and use. I use if for peanut butter and jelly sandwiches. Nutella sandwiches. Jelly sandwiches and regular sandwiches with Mayo. Works great with the Philadelphia cream cheese too. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality and reasonably priced.
reviews.reviewText: Just what I needed for making a sandwich.I smear some mayo on bread, slice tomato and cut sandwich in half all with this tool.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Spreader You Can Buy -
reviews.reviewText: My mom loves this model. It's of good size, comfortable in the hand, and spreads well. Great stain resistance with salty and acidic foods.The only downside is the rubber overlay gets a little beat up after a few years, not unusable, just worn looking. We average 5-7 years on them before replacement.

Excellent quality. Functions well. It has a few small rust like marks on it from soaking too long when handwashing dishes but that's our fault and not the sellers fault. The knife seems very durable and it feels good in the hand. My preferred knife when spreading something on bread items. Cuts well too!
This knife is just the right size for everything I need it for (it is not a bread knife). It is quite sharp, both at the point and along the serrations.
No espere que era tan grande! Pero funciona muy bien and very good quality

reviews.reviewTitle: Filo extremo, duración del filo inmejorable
reviews.reviewText: Es el más duradero y alto filo que me ha tocado probar. Excelente! El precio muy por debajo de la calidad. Lo malo la funda en realidad muy peligrosa de usar. Se corre un GRAN riesgo de cortarse al usarla
je n'ai reçu qu'un couteau, pas un lot de 2. lame très imposante.
